pages.text: The hammer is, in essence, a larger, heavier mace. Its massive head delivers a devastating hit on impact, making it an incredibly powerful weapon on par with a war axe. The heavy weight also grants the hammer extraordinary armor penetration, rendering even the heaviest, hardest suits of armor little more than an amusing suggestion.
The extreme weight of the hammer makes it very difficult to parry with, so other forms of defense are recommended when wielding a hammer.
